name: Ragni torture area
info: A small compound with prison cells, blood, cobwebs, and skull

name: Nivla Woods ritual site
info: A glade surrounded by candles, looks ritualistic

name: Nivla Woods rose tree circle
info: A circle of six charred tree stumps around a rose that judging by F3 has an armour stand in/on it

name: Time Valley crystal slots
info: Here, on the front of the temple, you can see a large sapphire slot at the centre, three on the left, and two, with one empty slot, on the right.

name: Little Wood dark cultist cave
info: A dark cultist cave. A miniboss called the Temporal Horror spawns here and drops dark aura which you need for the dark mask you can get at the ravine village.

name: abandoned Corkus sewers
info: Long disused this section of Corkus sewers has become home to a great amount of gross slime and broken pipes. It is not known why it was abandoned, however it may be because it is built below Avos land.

name: Ocean coast dark knight cave
info: Cave full of Dark Knights and Dark Archers

name: Ocean coast Castaway mercenary settlement
info: Small settlement of "Castaway Mercenaries"

name: Desert Sandstorm Vandals hideout
info: Small Cave located in the East side of the desert filled with a few houses and signs giving more details on each bandits residing in the cave

name: SE bee hive
source: coords from Ruined Olmic City side
info: A small lonely hive hidden among the spike around the olmic city.

name: Ruined Olmic City curious starers cave
info: a small cave / hole above some ruins behind the ruined olmic city, when you enter your character will be frozen and a group of curious starers will appear and encircle you, after a few seconds you will be teleported in a secret cave above the first one with 3 tier; <b>UNRELIABLE<b>

name: Ruined Olmic City underground
info: Medium size underground below one of the building. Contains 3 cells. Dern influence clearly visible

name: Ruined Olmic City temple side
info: Massive building inside the mountain. There is tunnel with fallen ceiling

name: Ruined Olmic City underground altar
info: Small underground altar

name: Avos territory giant eggs
info: Three massive eggs in a large nest on a hillside

name: Avos territory bloody cave
info: A large cave full of blood and skulls in Avos territory

name: Avos territory large bloody cave
info: You can enter this cave by falling through a large hole in a house above it. There also exists a side entrance. The cave is full of blood and flesh.

name: Avos territory ancient ruins under Uth Shrine
info: Old stone brick ruins and archways directly under the Uth shrine. New, wooden scaffolding is found nearby, with a campsite closer to the cave's entrance full of mechs.

name: Avos territory cage cave
info: A large, open cave with many cages hanging from the ceiling. There are spikes, skulls and blood around the area. The entrance is guarded by a row of Avos warriors. Looking at the structure, it seems that when the prisoners die, the floors of the cages are opened, and the bodies are left in piles under the cages.

name: CotL abandoned tower
info: Abandoned tower in CotL

name: CotL Bantishu Air Temple beehive
info: Beehive in Bantishu Air temple

name: CotL Bantishu Temple cave tree
info: A large tree and small ruins in a massive cave in the Bantishu Air Temple

name: CotL Bantishu Air Temple passage
info: Big passage from the air temple into the canyons

name: CotL mining site
info: A large mining site

name: Eldritch Outlook sculpted wall
info: The walls of the EO Contains small statues, this one seems to represent a humanoid being riding a horse

name: Wynn-Mesa mountains grave
source:
coords
at the top of the mountains
info: A little gave with wooden cross and sign saying: "To chime and bell, To solitude, I bid thee, Farewell."

name: Abandoned Mines mountains camp
info: Small abandoned camp in the mountains

name: Corrupted Village ruined houses
info: 3 small ruined houses near Corrupted Village

name: Ruined Olmic City altar
info:
What looks to be a withered skull behind bars, maybe a prison, which what looks like a key holder to open the doors
Seems like a stash (chest miniroom), I didn't it open yet.

name: SE curious starers area (TOR quest)
info:
When you walk up into the little hole in the wall three curious starers will appear behind you for only a seccond. Strange how this occurrence happened elsewhere
One time

name: SE withered flower
info: What looks to be a withered flower in a cave. Its the only flower there

name: SE darkness spikes with red substance
info: These darkness spikes right before the Olmic City are connected to darkness swirls, and at the contact point, some sort of red substance is formed

name: Mesa village burned down
info: Small settlement burnt down

name: Mesa mountains small settlement
info: A collection of few large tents

name: Mesa mountains abandoned house
info: small abandoned house in the mountains of Mesa

name: Mesa mountains abandoned mining site
info: Abandoned mining site in the mountains of mesa

name: Mesa mountains exiled tribe members camp
info: Small camp of exiled tribe members

name: CotL abandoned tent
info: An abandoned tent in Canyon of the lost

name: CotL empty camp
info: An empty camp with no enemies but there is blood and alot of brewing stands. There also is a long cave leading to a skeleton

name: Ice Canyon Ohms grave
info:
Grave of Ohms (NOT Olm). It used to open by throwing 'mechanical key' in a hopper (white carpet), not non-functional
It can be opened by throwing hp pot into the hopper. Key can be obtained by killing golems below

name: Ruined Olmic City entrance TOR quest cave
info: Entrance to quest area (The Olmic Rune). Has 2 statues with swords with them

name: MH CotL exit crystal valley
info:
valley south of the cotl's exit containing many crystals and a cave under a lake
Crystals turned into SD

name: CotL freed soul outlook
info: cave with bugbear leading to outlook with one freed soul mob

name: CotL bugbear wall cave
info: cave with bugbears and a wall with symbols

name: CotL deserter pit
info: pit with deserters and T4 loot chest, must be traversed to escape

name: Ocean deserted farm islands
source: East of Corkus island, near Zhight island and Pirate Cove
info: A group of small islands with deserted farm ruins. Aggressive mobs called 'Squid Vicious' spawn in the middle

name: Ocean deserted island beehive
info: A beehive

name: ocean raised wooden platform
source: East of Avos territory, south of Volcanic Isles
info: An overgrown wooden plateau in the middle of an ocean. A bird head can be found on top, possibly related to the nearby Avos. Similar platforms are found northeast in the middle of the Ocean and near the Gavel coastline.

name: ocean raised wooden platform 2
source: In the middle of the ocean
info: An overgrown wooden plateau in the middle of an ocean, with yellow banners on it. Similar platforms are found near the Avos territory and near the Gavel coastline.

name: ocean raised wooden platform 3
info: An overgrown wooden plateau in the middle of an ocean, with blue banners on it. Similar platforms are found southwest near the Avos territory and in the middle of the ocean.

name: ocean raised wooden platform 4
info: An overgrown wooden plateau on the Underwater Route, this time without a roof. Similar platforms are found southwest near the Avos territory, near Gavel coast and in the middle of the ocean.

name: ocean raised wooden platform 5
info: An overgrown wooden plateau near Selchar with red banners on it. Similar platforms are found southwest near the Avos territory, near Gavel coast, on the Underwater Route and in the middle of the ocean.

name: ocean shipwrecked man camp
info: A camp with shipwrecked men, a tent, and a cooking pot

name: ocean beehive on a ship
info: Beehive on a ship near Corkus, there is a loot chest above it.

name: ocean border cave with pink and green crystals
info:
A cave near the Talking Mushroom signs in the ocean. Inside is a pink crystal and a few green crystals.
There are also ruins inside, similar in architectural style to the Olmic ruins.

name: ragni penisula stone structure
info: A small structurewith a cave full of pirates
